name: Skyline Rush! - ZJAM 2021 Entry
description:
Build the tallest skyline rushed by hectic mechanics that will force you to take advantage of your reflexes.

Rules

  • Click over a building to build new floors
  • Don't let the clouds get over your buildings
  • Don't build more floors than the center building

Hope you like it :)

This game was developed in 48h for Zjam 2021 by DoGold Team:

@CHUMASQUITO

@TheReal_LeGod

@_jowent
